basics.name: Henry Mellor
basics.label: Computer Science Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science with a focus in Data-Centric Computing at Virginia Tech. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2025.

work.company: Virginia Tech Business and Management Systems
work.summary: Operations IT support for administrators at Virginia Tech
highlights: Maintain, update, and deploy hundreds of computers across the school's administration
Troubleshoot and solve technological issues which may inhibit users' workflows both in-person and over the phone.
Teach and reinforce calculus concepts in a virtual environment
Explain concepts in an easy-to-understand and effective way

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to students earning and maintaining a 3.5 GPA or higher throughout the semester.
